sentences.sContent: They threw down the challenge that he couldn’t wash 40 cars in one hour (= invited him to try to do it ) .
sentences.sCn: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

phrases.pCn: 接受挑战，奋起应付挑战

words.tran: 挑战的；引起挑战性兴趣的
要求；质疑；反对；向…挑战；盘问（challenge的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 挑战；质疑；艰巨任务，难题
trans.tranOther: something that tests strength, skill, or ability, especially in a way that is interesting
to refuse to accept that something is right, fair, or legal
